summary: Add´s the 1h Sword "Truth" to your game.
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][SIZE=7][COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]The Truth [/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE][COLOR=#0070c0][FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=5] by Standalone09[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Feature:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

[youtube]HAXW6MPIZvs[/youtube]

[youtube]v3jyPeLF1zc[/youtube]

videos by Slothability and Gruntlock please guys check them channels out cauz this guys makes Swords show of rly rly Sweet 
thanks dude´s! :)

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Description:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

You can find the sword inside the Riverwood Trader but you have to steal it though for now ;)
and like always please comment guys your opinions give me a direction that i need as a modder :)

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Install:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your SkyrimData folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the TRUTH.esp 

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Uninstall:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]


Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: standalone09
